articles.author: Rachel Summer Small
articles.title: America's Got Talent fans left in TEARS over performance of Putri Ariani - Daily Mail
articles.description: Putri Ariani, who hails from Indonesia, gave a show-stopping performance that triggered waterworks for judges and viewers alike. Even usually stoic Simon Cowell was moved by her act.
articles.content:
The United States was introduced this week to singing sensation Putri Ariani after her show-stopping, triumphant performance on America's Got Talent.
It was an act that brought tears to the eyes of … [+2256 chars]

articles.title: How Wildfire Smoke Is Affecting Our Oceans, Lakes And Rivers - Videos from The Weather Channel - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Smoke from Canadian wildfires has caused some American cities to have the worst air quality in the world this week. But it’s also having a large effect on our oceans, rivers and lakes. Here’s what you need to know. - Videos from The Weather Channel | weather.…
articles.content:
June 8, 2023
